imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Banana-themed app logo, flat vector style, high contrast (banana-earn-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Minimal header/hero illustration with bananas and coins, clean modern style (banana-earn-hero.dim_1600x600.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity login and show a signed-in vs signed-out experience for the earning app.
Build the main earning app UI with pages/sections for: Dashboard (balance + recent activity), Earn (task list), and Withdraw (request payout + request status list).
Add basic anti-abuse and validation rules to keep the earning app consistent and safe: positive rewards, balance never goes negative, and withdrawal amount checks.
Apply a cohesive, creative visual theme (colors, typography, layout) suitable for a “Banana Earn” rewards app and use it consistently across all screens.
Generate and include static visual assets for the app (logo + simple header/hero illustration) and render them from frontend static assets.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create backend data models and APIs to support an earning (rewards) flow: user profile, balance, task completion records, and withdrawal requests.
Seed the app with a small set of example earning tasks (stored/defined in the backend) so the UI is usable immediately after deployment.
